item.title: What is plgd
item.description: What are the biggest problems in IoT? Where do current market IoT solutions fall short? How should IoT be considered? Put another way, “What are the most common issues preventing companies from fully realizing the benefits of IoT?" This question was answered at DZone by 23 executives involved with the Internet of Things. Observations Companies are not able, or do not have the talent, to complete the end-to-end solution.
